Articles.Content:
57 minutes ago, SSTO Crasher said:

Does that kerbalx download work for non steam

It shouldn't matter as long as you know where the folder containing your save is.
Ok I got it, and I have done the gameplay and got the pics, get ready
yay!

The great battle

The koviets had gotten the companion ships for Revolution-1 ready. With all of their assets ready they grouped their ships in LKO.

With everything ready they set out for the mun to destroy this threat. The battle did not take long.

The koviet forces lost. Revolution 2 and three were probes, and they were both destroyed. Val barely escaped with her life, and almost none of her ship survived.

But, the D.A.R.T had not won yet, because while it seemed like it was unmatched, a few minutes later a railgun missile shot out of the darkness.

The shot missed, but the crew on board was caught completely by surprise, and was not even able to grab the stick before a second shot hit the engine bay.

The crew was thrown about the ship, and during the hit the fuel tanks were severely weakened, and when another shot hit the center of the ship they ruptured, and the craft was completely annihilated.

And as the debris field spread out the kamerican battleship Freedom emerged from the destruction.



“KSC, I have destroyed the enemy ship” says the pilot

KSC: “You have done well. Leave mun orbit and patrol high kerbin orbit”


 

In the ksc, the mood was great, the ships threatening kerbin were now destroyed, and there was peace

However, aboard the wreckage of the DART, Adrin had different plans.

Edited February 14, 2022 by SSTO Crasher
Wait @Akagi was that ship I destroyed meant to be the dart
yes, it was a Type A Heavy 3rd Year Direct Assault Recon Transport.

Because it kind of has to be it now, unless they delete the design, please have them delete the design my computer could not handle that many parts

You could work it into the plot that the design was too expensive for its use as it blew up so easily. Also it’s such a shame my computer could not handle it, that was a good ship

Also the wiki needs updating, the battleship freedom needs a page, and it needs to be noted that revolution-1 was destroyed

roger

That was an Ambassador-class, the last of its kind. Most are around the size of an Aeris 5A.
Though seriously, I have no idea why that thing blew up so easily.
no armor
Even though it had no armor I did not expect every fuel tank in the ship to explode
yeah, a bit boomy...

Ok here is the description for Freedom 

Freedom is the first battleship built by the kamericans, it is classified as a destroyer. The ship was built in response to the koviet fighters that were in LKO, and it was launched just before the first battle of the mun.

History

The ship was first proposed during the second great kerbin war. During this war kappanese satellites were spying on the kamericans and koviets, who were allies at the time. Kamerican high command proposed the idea of using a battleship to shoot down the satellites, but out of fear of causing space to become a theater of war, Kapitol rejected the plans, and the kresident ordered that the ship not be built. However the plans still existed, and when the DART and the koviet fighters appeared, the kresident ordered that the ship be built. The ship was launched the week before the great mun battle, and it’s plan was to destroy the koviet fighters and then catch the DART by surprise. However the fighters engaged the dart first, and Freedom arrived within 10 km of the ship just as the last fighter was destroyed. Although it’s mission was slightly changed, the ship still had one target to take out. It fired three shots from 300 meters, one missed, one hit the engine bay, and one hit the fuel tanks, completely destroying the ship. Freedom then returned to kerbin orbit

Armament

The ship is equipped with 4 railgun missiles and 3 torpedoes.

k

the next D.A.R.T.s use EPCM and HiMAT, making then nearly unhittable.

as a naval historian, it is either a battleship or a destroyer. which one?

What are EPCMs and HiMATs

I would say it is a heavy destroyer

EPCM = Electronic Perceptive CounterMeasures = the ships get blurrier as you approach = you can't hit me

HiMAT = Highly Maneuverable Aircraft Technology = i can go really really fast = i become Sonic the HedgehogSpacecraft

How are you going to do that without mods

I can work into the plot that the ships are hard to catch but I’m not sure about the first one

Also save the next attack for later in the plot, the kamericans and the koviets have a war to fight

mmm, the EPCM also makes missiles go beserk

i got that from Crunchyroll

At koviet hq

“Sir, it has failed. Look at the report” Says the intern. “Ok I gue- HOW ON KERBIN COULD WE LOSE ALL THREE FIGHTERS TO A LIGHTLY ARMED RECON CRAFT WITH NO ARMOR!” Says Sergey Kerman, head of the koviet space program. “I do not know, all we know is that we lost our ships and then a kamerican destroyer came out of the black and destroyed our target.” Says the intern “if the kamericans have that much power what are we meant to do.” Sergey actually did know what they were going to do, since revolution 1 shot down that kamerican satellite they both knew that there was going to be an eventual confrontation between the 2 superpowers in space.

At the ksc:

“sir, we are receiving reports of the koviets preparing destroyers to attack us” Says Linus Kerman “then have freedom restock it munitions and make sure that liberty is ready to launch at a moment’s notice”
Ok quick I need ships for the upcoming battle between the koviets and the kamericans

this could be a koviet ship

https://kerbalx.com/Dadkitess/DC-SSTO-DeltaVeeV57
My computer could barely handle the dart, which was three hundred parts. Plus, I need warships and I kinda want them to be built by the people working on this and not just taken off of kerbalx
What a coincidence! Neolite focuses on making low part-count craft for potato computers.....but unfortunately they do use BD Armory, and none of them are spaceships....

Ok, you can use the shipbuilders guide to learn space naval stuff, one of the episodes is on page 115 of the naval battle league, use the YouTube channel that was posted on to get the full series 

Edited February 16, 2022 by SSTO Crasher
